an10.98:1.1: “Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu yassam yassam disayam viharati, phasuyeva viharati.
an10.98:1.6: ditthiya suppatividdho, ubhayani kho panassa patimokkhani vittharena svagatani honti suvibhattani suppavattini suvinicchitani suttaso anubyanjanaso,
an10.98:1.8: dhammakamo hoti piyasamudaharo abhidhamme abhivinaye ularapamojjo,
an10.98:1.10: pasadiko hoti abhikkantapatikkante susamvuto antaraghare nisajjaya,
an10.98:1.11: catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi,
an10.98:1.12: asavananca khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an10.98:1.13: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu yassam yassam disayam viharati, phasuyeva viharati”ti.
